name: Pigment Painter
description:
You're a Pig, whose quest is to save a grey world by educating artists on harmful art practices and showing them healthy alternatives, thus bringing color to the world!

Collect the Seven Pigments to advance and beat the hazardous smog cloud, Vlad! Only by collecting all pigments will the barrier disappear and open the gates to save the helpless artist, Kelvin!

This projected was completed at California Summer Arts in a two week intensive video game class. We were split into teams and challenged with a theme of art Eco-friendly materials.

Gregory Bush: 2D Pixel art, characters, and backgrounds. Designer, main role to insure that message is clearly presented.

Kevin Minh Nguyen: Animator and also contributed with Pixel art. Co-Designer and assisted with programming. Was main level designer and Q&A tester. Sound effects.

Tyler Stannard: Concept art, programming, producer, and creative thinker.

Rachel Mejia: Programming, mechanics, interfaces, and also helped bring in other artists to contribute.

Jessica Mejia: Contributed creative writing towards the stories plot and lore.

Cindy Salazar: For original musical soundtrack to our game.

Inspired by Alter Eco Artist Art Inspector, Danielle Siembieda

Keyboard Controls:

WASD/ Arrow Keys: to move through interface and main game

F/ Space: To jump or go back in interface

G/ Left mouse button: To attack and advance in interface

Numkey 1: To reset

Numkey 1 & 2: To quit game
